title: Science Education Module Design Utilizing Integrated Content Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Scientific Theories and Basic Experimental Techniques
context.additional_context: Design and implementation of science education modules using VR simulations in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design the structure (concepts, activities, assessments) of science education modules by applying integrated content modeling techniques.
Learners can develop science content that integrates theory and practice in VR simulation environments and apply it to real-world problem-solving.
Learners can validate the effectiveness and reusability of developed educational modules through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
